long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO Labs: Your Ultimate SEO Analysis Toolkit

Transform your SEO strategy with SEO Labs, the comprehensive Chrome extension designed to optimize your web pages effortlessly. Whether you're a digital marketer, content creator, or website owner, SEO Labs provides the essential tools you need to analyze and improve your website's search engine performance.

Key Features:

Focus Keywords Analysis

Input multiple focus keywords and use PrimeReact's autocomplete feature to streamline your keyword research process.
Analyze your current web page for keyword usage and optimization with a single click.
SEO Information Overview

Get detailed SEO data for your web pages, including:
URL
Title Tag
Meta Description
Canonical URL
hreflang Tags
Open Graph Tags (og
, og
, og
, and more)
Instantly identify missing elements with error icons and highlighted content.
Headings Structure Validation

Visualize your heading hierarchy with a clear, structured tree view.
Automatically highlight focus keywords within your headings.
Receive alerts for missing H1 and H2 tags, and detect hierarchy errors.
Keyword Distribution Insights

Analyze the distribution of your focus keywords within your content.
Get comprehensive word and character counts, excluding HTML tags.
Visualize keyword density and receive feedback with color-coded labels (Great, Good, Average, Warning, Danger).
Link Analysis

Parse and categorize links on your page into Navigation, Footer, and Content links.
Identify and highlight do-follow and no-follow links with distinct labels.
Instantly find and review all internal and external links on your web pages.
Settings

Easily manage your data with options to clear all keywords and reset analyzed data for a fresh start.

Why Choose SEO Labs?

User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design makes it easy to navigate and use.
Detailed Insights: Comprehensive analysis helps you identify and fix SEO issues quickly.
Performance Optimization: Fast and efficient, SEO Labs ensures you get the information you need without slowing down your browsing experience.
Secure and Reliable: Built with the latest web technologies, SEO Labs is secure and reliable, protecting your data and privacy.

How to Use:

Install the SEO Labs extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Click the SEO Labs icon in your Chrome toolbar.
Input your focus keywords and click 'Analyze' to start your SEO audit.
Navigate through the tabs to view detailed insights and recommendations for your web page.
Unlock the full potential of your website's SEO with SEO Labs. Download now and start optimizing your web pages for better search engine performance!
